info.title: Binar Car Rent Api
info.description: This is a simple CRUD API application made with Express and documented with Swagger

tags.description: Operations related to cars for all users

get.description: Retrieve a list of all cars

Get All With Name.description: Get all cars by name 'locallhost:9000/api/v1/cms/cars?name=Chevrolet Camaro'
